quest.name: Aimless Protector
journal:
 Quest Sync
Nesh Ohr has something to ask you.
objectives: Lie in wait at the designated location and defeat the father of armored dragons.

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: Come closer, little one. I must ask thee─did a pitiable dragonet meet its end at thy hand?

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: Though I cannot find it in my heart to thank thee, nor shall I admonish thee. The young one would have suffered every living moment...as do we all, though some torments are more easily borne.

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: If thou wouldst prevent further needless suffering, pray seek my shelled kin at the shallow lake. He hath wallowed overlong in hatred beyond healing.

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: Wait by the waterside, and he will find thee.

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: ...So it is done. I heard his dying cry.

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: His bloodline was the strongest of the armored ones, possessed of carapaces like unto stone. Yet even they were not impervious to the metal fiends' onslaught.

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: It took but one to raze their nest. Even now, its terrible form doth linger in my mind─the four jaws that ravened 'neath a shroud of steel...

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: And to the few who escaped the carnage, life has gifted naught but despair. They yearn for vengeance, though our enemy has long since quit this place.

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: As thou hast witnessed, they now turn all too quickly to indiscriminate violence... Alas, this only feedeth the fires of their guilt─never doth it quell them.

dialogue.name: NESHOHR
dialogue.text: Nay, I fear that only death hath that power.
